title: Bad Moon Rising
description: This brutal family drama, set in rural America at the turn of the century, captures the deep brooding emotions of its backwoods people.Over the years, Annie has come to terms with her mothers' endless stream of lovers; her fathers' infinite love and patience; and her weird brother Nathan. But when the rumours start about the missing men, she knows she must find the truth and change her life.
author: Anita Dawes
